actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry (Subsequently: Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry (Subsequently: Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry).

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to guarantee loans made to producers for the purpose of constructing grain storage facilities on the farms of such producers.
short_title: Emergency Farm Grain Storage Facilities Construction Act

summary.text: Emergency Farm Grain Storage Facilities Construction Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, through the Commodity Credit Corporation, to guarantee loans to wheat and feed grains producers for the construction of storage facilities. Provides for a guarantee with respect to 90 percent of the total construction cost, not to exceed $50,000. Sets a formula for determining the proper size of a storage facility for which a loan may be guaranteed under this Act. Sets the loan term at no more than ten years.

titles.title: Emergency Farm Grain Storage Facilities Construction Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to guarantee loans made to producers for the purpose of constructing grain storage facilities on the farms of such producers.
